# Multi-Source RAG Platform - AI Context Map

## Primary Documentation
- CLAUDE.md: Source of truth for architecture, style, and commands. READ THIS FIRST.

## Codebase Structure
- scripts/: Python automation tools, RAG pipeline, and Streamlit UI.
- app/: CLI application entry point.
- configs/: Configuration files (chunking rules, etc.).
- tests/: Pytest suite.
- docs/: Project documentation (see docs/README.md).

## Key Concepts
- RAG Pipeline: Ingest -> Chunk -> Embed -> Retrieve -> Ask.
- UI: Streamlit-based frontend (scripts/ui/).

## Quick Start
- Setup: `poetry install`
- Run UI: `streamlit run scripts/ui/ui.py`
